title: Baker's and Rosen’s Time to Shine, and Week 4 Preview | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 310)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss how Baker Mayfield and Josh Rosen will affect their teams, whether the 49ers should tank, and what the future holds in Dallas (2:00). Then the guys preview the top games heading into Week 4, offer up their sneaky truths, and introduce a new segment to the show (31:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
